entry.title: Today in DeFi - Binance FTX Potential Merger, Bebop Live, Inverse DBR Airdrop, and More...
entry.summary: Binance FTX Potential Merger On Nov. 2nd, Coindesk reported on a leaked balance sheet from Alameda Research, which maintains close ties with FTX. On Sunday night, Binance's CEO sent a tweet about selling FTT. FTX users started to withdraw amounts in big amounts, causing a liquidity crunch on the exchange. FTX was then forced to sell part of its crypto holdings to keep the reserve from depletion.

entry.title: Learn from my mistakes
Today in DeFi - Solana Layer N, Neon EVM, Incentivized Auto-compounding, and More...
entry.summary: Upcoming: Solana Layer N Solana scaling Protocol Layer N is scheduled for mainnet launch next year. Layer N aims to be the first blockchain to match the throughput of a centralized exchange. Upcoming: Neon EVM Neon Labs sets to launch Neon EVM, the first EVM on solana to mainnet on Dec. 12th. Neon EVM will allow devs to port Ethereum-based dApps on top of Solana.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - GameStop NFT Marketplace Live, Google Cloud x Solana, Meta Instagram NFTs Coming, and More...
Today in DeFi - FTX Ventures Bets Lens, PancakeSwap Live on Aptos, Intro to Tranches, and More...
entry.summary: FTX Ventures Bets Lens FTX Ventures is reportedly to invest in Lens, the social media protocol built by Aave. PancakeSwap Live on Aptos PancakeSwap has enabled trading for a few USDC pairs on Aptos and will launch incentivized farms soon. Chainlink Low-Latency Oracle

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Meta NFTs Mint & Sell, MetaMask in Games, Sommelier Strategy Tokens, and More...
entry.summary: Meta NFTs Mint & Sell Meta announces it will enable mint & sell NFTs on Instagram. The first chain to support is Polygon, with NFT collections stored on Arweave. MetaMask in Games MetaMask will be injected into games supported by the partner stores. Players will be able to carry their wallets, tokens, NFTs, and achievements into every game with web3 capabilities.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - BobaBNB L2, MakerDAO Polling to Onboard Compound D3M, Intro to Dexible, and More...
entry.summary: Boba BNB L2 Multichain L2 network Boba integrated with BnB Chain and launched BobaBNB L2. A bunch of defi projects including Sushiswap will be deployed on BobaBNB soon. MakerDAO Polling to Onboard Compound D3M MakerDAO is polling to onboard parameters to activate Compound D3M. If passed and approved, a $160m DAI Debt Ceiling and a 2% Target Borrow Rate will be deployed, bringing ~$1.8m DAI in annual revenue to Maker.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - GameStop NFT Marketplace Live, Gearbox V2 Live, Intro to LlamaLend, and More...
entry.summary: GameStop NFT Marketplace Live Leading video game retailer GameStop launches its NFT marketplace on ImmutableX. Gearbox V2 Live Generalized leverage protocol Greabox launches V2, making leverage trading more efficient and secure. Along with the upgrade, the two LMs (passive LP LM & CA LM) are also live for farmers.

Today in DeFi - LlamaLend Live, FTX Working on Stablecoin, Intro to Integral SIZE, and More...
entry.summary: LlamaLend Live Built by DeFiLlama, LlamaLend is an NFT lending protocol that has fixed interest rates and no price liquidations. FTX Working on Stablecoin FTX is reported to be working on its own stablecoin, likely to launch via partnerships. Spin Live on NEAR
